meanings.definition: Postmillennialists: believers in postmillennialism, a Christian eschatological belief that the Second Coming of Christ will occur after a period of peace and prosperity on earth.
meanings.sent1: The postmillennialists in our church study the Bible together.
meanings.sent2: Many postmillennialists have hope for a bright future on earth.
meanings.sent3: The postmillennialists joked that they would have a big party after the Second Coming.
meanings.sent4: In their view, postmillennialists see the world as heading towards a golden age.
meanings.sent5: The postmillennialists' optimism shines through their belief in a peaceful future.

meanings.definition: Postmillennialists: those who adhere to the postmillennialist interpretation of biblical prophecy.
meanings.sent1: We had a discussion with the postmillennialists about their views on biblical prophecy.
meanings.sent2: The postmillennialists' interpretation of prophecy differs from others.
meanings.sent3: During the debate, the postmillennialists made a clever argument.
meanings.sent4: The postmillennialists' perspective on prophecy is like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: Listening to the postmillennialists talk about prophecy is always enlightening.
